title: 200,000 reasons
creator_credit: Austral Pacific Productions, British Petroleum, Andrew J. Helgeson and Eric Fullilove
brief_description: Shows the life and work of some 27,000 members of the Surf Life Saving Association of Australia. Stresses the similarity between the surfer and the life-saver, and looks at the range of equipment used in rescue - jet boats, radios and 4-wheel drive vehicles. Includes scenes of training, competition and club life.
